sections.heading: and Child Health and Public Health Work Fund; federal aid; acceptance
sections.text: The fund created by section 71-2201 may be augmented by grants from the United States and by such additional appropriations as may be made by law.SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 29, § 5, p. 178;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 81-5722;R.S.1943,

71-2204.Maternal and Child Health and Public Health Work Fund; federal aid; acceptance.

The fund created by section 71-2201 may be augmented by grants from the United States and by such additional appropriations as may be made by law.

SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 29, § 5, p. 178;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 81-5722;R.S.1943, § 81-612.
